name: Don't Touch My Thermostat
description:
In this game, you play as a boy who recently got his three most important things taken away from him, his console, controller, and TV. These were taken away from him for doing the unthinkable... touching Dad's thermostat. Meanwhile, you have an iron deficiency and you're always freezing, It's only a matter of time until you freeze. You try and reason with your dad but he's in a blind rage over the fondling of his sacred thermostat.

Directions:
  • Search for and retrieve your possessions so you can continue gaming. 
  • You must raise the thermostat to warm yourself up. (You really have to get up high to click it sorry)
  • Be careful not to freeze. Dad hates it when you touch the thermostat so much, he will dropkick you for it.
  • WASD to move, Mouse for head movement. LShift to sprint, Space to jump, LControll to crouch, LMB to throw "throwable" items.
Tips:
  • Dad is alerted by sound and vision so be sure to sneak around, LControll to sneak.
  • Your dad usually hides your stuff up high, in his bedroom, and sometimes he will bury your things in the yard. 
  • Some furniture can be pushed to reach things up high, (like the thermostat).

This game was made for the Level Up Circle, 9-day Game Jam. The theme: "Temperature is key."
